reviews.review_text: Great little puzzler. Lots of fun!

This game is a lot of fun! Played through the first few levels, then fiddled around with the level editor, very good and easy to play game. Music is brilliant also!  Buy this game, you wont be disapointed

Great little chill game you can pick up and play at any time, even when you've only got a few minutes spare, I was concerned it might have been over really quick, but it took me about 3 hours to complete all the levels, (not including any additional downloadable content). Great value, well polished game. Looking forward to seeing more like this from Dan.
Awesome couch puzzle game with great steam controller support.
